name: Varangian Story
description:
You are a member of the emperor's elite guard. Search the countryside. Can you find medicine before it's too late?

Made with Game Maker2. 

Entry for GBJAM 7.

Sorry no music :-) (play something adventurous in the background)

Controls : 

WASD or Arrows : Movement

Space :      Start (start game in TitleScreen)

K/X :        A-button(talk and mount horse, pickup items)

L/C:         B-Button(unmount horse)
